channel.title: XBox 360 NAT settings (Linksys WRT54GS)
channel.description: I have noticed that it takes longer to join a game lately, so when i started playing halo 3, it let me, but kept telling me about how my NAT is recommended open (it is at moderate). I have read around google, you must port forward 88 & 3074, and change MTU from 1500(auto) to 1365(manual). But my problem lurks within the port forwarding, my xbox seems to change IPs every time it accesses online. I googled it once again, said assign a static IP. No clue how to do that. Anyone here ever heard of a problem similar?

item.title: XBox 360 NAT settings (Linksys WRT54GS)
item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

No. Xbox live is messing up right now. But, Sometimes it works, Sometimes it doesn’t.

Past month to be honest.

But, For Frell’s problem, Has it done it before?

Sometimes, It’s certain people you try to join who is Host, and who isn’t. And that NAT message comes up.
Mine says I have the most, Flexible, And I can’t join people with Closed.

But overall, Lately, Yes, Xbox live, is being OMEGA slow.

Read full topic
